content: in a legal case that lasted for 2 years and 1 month the viru county court made a final decision on 28042021 the court ruled that one party is responsible for covering the procedural costs but the exact amount is not specified the court resolved the claims and counterclaims made by the parties involved the joint assets of the parties including an apartment a garage and a car will be sold at public auction and the proceeds divided equally the funds in the parties bank accounts will also be divided equally one party was awarded a certain amount of money in relation to mutual claims the costs of the proceedings will be borne by the parties both parties have the right to appeal the decision within 30 days the court explains the requirements for procedural assistance and the consequences of not meeting the deadline the text also mentions that a statement of claim has been filed by one of the parties who is seeking the division of common property after a divorce the court reviews the evidence and determines that the common property should be sold and the proceeds divided equally between the parties the court also orders compensation for expenses made during the marriage and addresses the defendants use of joint assets for personal benefit the judgment made by judge xxxxxxxx in the tartu district court has been partially annulled
